metadata.dc:author: Gisbert, Javier
Ramírez, Rafael
Pérez, Palmira
Ferrer, Maria J
Bermell, Aranzazu
Saiz, Vicente
metadata.dc:description: Malignant otitis externa is a devastating disease that poses a diagnostic and therapeutic challenge. The objective of our study was to demonstrate the importance of detailed clinical analysis and to provide an update on the current diagnostic and therapeutic tools available.
metadata.dc:title: Otitis externa maligna. Nuestra experiencia.
[Malignant otitis externa. Our experience].
